security: Revealing internal procedures for checking cover status related to employee retirement could expose operational security measures. Quoting directly: 'Please check your records for any cover considerations in connection with the release of a retirement medallion'
summary: A speed letter from Christos S. Gikas to the Chief of the Central Cover Staff, requesting a check for any cover considerations related to the release of a retirement medallion to Guy Vitale.
summary_one_paragraph: On February 26, 1969, Christos S. Gikas sent a speed letter to the Chief of the Central Cover Staff, specifically addressed to James W. Franklin, Acting Chief of the Employee Activity Branch, requesting a review of records to determine if any cover considerations were necessary before releasing a retirement medallion to Guy Vitale of the DDP/WH. The reply indicated no cover objections.
title: Request for Cover Check - Guy Vitale Retirement Medallion
